question: What are the latest technology investments made by companies that have an active online community discussing artificial intelligence?

subtasks.task: Identify companies with an active online community discussing artificial intelligence. [SocialMediaInfo]
Find the latest technology investments made by those companies. [CompanyTechStack, CompanyDealMaster]
